column1: Kata Robata////Waited over an hour for my food because the staff was bad at keeping up with the Saturday night rush. No apologies were made
column2: no comment except "the girls must have not seen you
column3: did you come up?" Saw everyone around me waiting close to two hours for a table. The food was not up to par
column4: definitely prefer Oishii's. Much more authentic food and experience. Infinitely better staff as well.
